text: Nayo uruhome rwari urw’abana babiri b’impfuvyi bo muri ico gisagara, no munsi y’urwo ruhome hakaba hari ububiko bwabo, n’Umuvyeyi wabo yari mubagira ineza, kuri ivyo rero Umuremyi wawe yashatse yuko boshika mubigero vy’abo hanyuma bashobore kwikurira ubwo bubiko bwabo, uwo n’umuhezagiro uvuye ku Muremyi wawe, nanje sinagize ibi vyose kw’itegeko ryanje, uku niko kuri kw’ivyo utashoboye kwihanganirako
